description: AAOR is a rare disorder classically characterised by a peripapillary annular band of gray-white opacification of the deep retina. On OCT it is characterised by thinning or atrophy of the outer retina/ONL, including disruption of the EZ within the annular area of RPE destruction.
title: Acute Annular Outer Retinopathy
article:
